00138         class PointList;
00139         
00142         struct Point {
00144             Point(void) : x(0), y(0) {}
00145             
00147             Point(double inX, double inY) : x(inX), y(inY) {}
00148             
00149             std::string getStringValue() const;
00150             
00151             PointList operator+(const Point& inPoint) const;
00152             PointList operator+(const PointList& inList) const;
00153             
00154             double x; 
00155             double y; 
00156         };
00157         
00165         class PointList : public vector<Point> {
00166          public:
00168             PointList() {}
00169             
00171             PointList(const Point inPoint) : std::vector<Point>(1, inPoint) {}
00172             
00174             PointList operator+(const PointList& inList) const {return PointList(*this) += inList;}
00175             
00177             PointList& operator+=(const PointList& inList) {
00178                 for ( unsigned i = 0; i < inList.size(); i++ ) push_back(inList[i]);
00179                 return *this;
00180             }
00181             
00183             PointList operator+(const Point& inPoint) const {return PointList(*this) += inPoint;}
00184             
00186             PointList& operator+=(const Point& inPoint) {
00187                 push_back(inPoint);
00188                 return *this;
00189             }
00190             
00191             string getStringValue(void) const;
00192         };
00193         
00196         struct RelPos : public Point {
00198             RelPos(void) : Point(0,0) {}
00199             
00201             RelPos(double inDx, double inDy) : Point(inDx, inDy) {}
00202         };

00207          public:

00210

00213

00215
